shortDescription: As a full-stack software developer, desgined and built scalable web applications and optimized deployment processes for ASU. Mentored junior developers and collaborated with clients to deliver efficient software solutions​.

Built the S-Clinical website. Designed and implemented a Clinical Trial Management System, integrating real-time updates, approval workflows, and secure data storage to improve trial management efficiency and accuracy.

Developed a patient portal, enabling remote consultations and easy access to prescriptions and medical reports. Implemented a video calling interface for real-time doctor-patient communication, integrating reports and prescriptions into the UI​.
